channel.title: main on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in main on Recipes

item.title: bacon-stuffed eggs
item.description: Ingredients 12 hard-boiled eggs 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 3 slices of bacon 1/2 cup grated cheese 2 cups bechamel Directions Split the eggs in two each. Mash the buds. Fry the bacon and break into small pieces. Add to the mashed yolks, season with salt and pepper and fill the egg halves. Mix the white sauce with the cheese, pour over the stuffed eggs and serve.

item.title: baked chicken with duchess puree
item.description: Ingredients RECIPE1 1 chicken salt at ease pepper cognac a quarter pound of butter RECIPE2 2 pounds of potatoes water salt to taste half a pound of butter pepper grated nutmeg 2 egg yolks a quarter of milk cream 6 tablespoons grated cheese Directions RECIPE1 Clean the chicken, go, wash it and dry it, season it with salt, spray the cogñac and place it in the mold you are going to use for roasting.

item.title: bean omelette
item.description: Ingredients 1 pound of beans 2 crumbled chorizos 3 beaten eggs 1 teaspoon grated onion 1-4 teaspoon pepper butter Directions Soften the beans and mash them. Add the other ingredients and mix. Put enough butter in the pan to cover the bottom. Pour into the pan, cover and simmer, come back and brown on both sides.

item.title: beef a la parisienne
item.description: Ingredients 1 1/2 pounds steak meat (beefsteak) 2 cloves of garlic 1 teaspoon salt 3/4 teaspoon pepper black powder 1 teaspoon lemon juice 1 teaspoon cider vinegar 1/2 teaspoon powders chili 1 teaspoon split oregano leaves 2 8-ounce cans of tomato sauce Directions Cut the meat into 4 servings. Mash the garlic and mix with the salt and pepper. Adobe the meat with this everywhere. Combine lemon juice and vinegar, chili powders and oregano.

item.title: brain pudding
item.description: Ingredients 1 brain 2 beaten eggs 4 tablespoons of breadcrumbs 6 tablespoons grated cheese 2 tablespoons butter 1 teaspoon salt 1-8 teaspoon pepper Directions Boil the brain, mash and strain through a cheesecloth. Add the eggs, bread, cheese, butter, salt and pepper. Season it to taste and pour it into a greased mold. Bake at a temperature of 350 degrees F for 30 minutes.

item.title: breaded meat medallions
item.description: Ingredients 2 pounds of ground beef 1 grated onion 1/2 tablespoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper powder 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg 4 eggs 1 1/2 cup cookie powder frying fat 8 toasted bread medallions mustard sauce Directions Place the meat in a bowl and add the onion, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Integrate well add 2 eggs, integrating each one ligating well. Add cracker meal to give consistency to the dough, but it should still be soft.

item.title: cod a la biscayan
item.description: Ingredients 1 pound of cod 1-2 cup olive oil 2 sliced onions 1-2 cup tomato sauce 1-2 cup olives 1 tablespoon capers 2 cloves of garlic 1 pound sliced potatoes 2 roasted ripe peppers 1-4 cup raisins Directions Put the cod in hot water, remove the skin and thorns and cut into medium-sized pieces. In a casserole put litters of cod, onions and potatoes, tomato sauce, olives, capers and raisins, garlic and strips of peppers.

item.title: creamy pumpkin soup
item.description: Ingredients 3 cups of mashed pumpkin 3 cups bechamel sauce 1 small onion, grated Directions Add onion and bechemel sauce to mashed pumpkin. Bring to a boil and season at ease. Strain and or broth. Serve callente with crackers or toasted bread.

item.title: frog legs a la Béarnaise
item.description: Ingredients 8 very fresh frog legs Go out at ease Pepper to taste Oil 3 fresh tomatoes 1 cup white wine Lemon juice (in abundance) Directions The legs are seasoned well and sautéed with the oil. Then add the chopped fresh tomato and white wine and lemon juice. Let cool with some fine chopped herbs. Serve in shells.

item.title: grilled lobster
item.description: Ingredients 1 3-pound lobster butter salt and pepper to taste Directions Cut the lobster lengthwise without removing the shell. Remove the stomach and intestines. Place each half on the grill, resting on the shell. Spread butter and sprinkle with pepper to taste. Simmer for 40 minutes. Serve hot with melted butter.

item.title: gypsy eggs
item.description: Ingredients regular amount of oil two garlic 10 or 12 peeled almonds a little piece of bread a few strands of saffron 1-2 teaspoons of cumin a little cinnamon powder boiling water salt 7 eggs Directions In a regular amount of oil we will start by frying two garlic, 10 or 12 peeled almonds, a piece of bread, removing when it is browned. In an almirez you start by crushing a few strands of saffron 1-2 teaspoon of cumin, a little cinnamon powder then the garlic, almonds and bread, soaking with drops of the same oil.

item.title: liver fillets
item.description: Ingredients liver fillets flour salt oil a bay leaf, 50 grams of butter a glass of Marsala wine cooked spinach lard cooked potatoes Directions Cut some liver fillets by touching the telita and nerves and pass them through flour and season with salt. Put in a frying pan half a cup of oil, heat well and brown the encores then add a bay leaf, 50 grams of butter, a glass of Marsala wine, cover and let it boil slowly until the fillets are cooked and the sauce reduced.

item.title: macaroni and Vienna sausages
item.description: Ingredients 1-2 pound macaroni 1-2 pounds of grated American cheese 2 cups white sauce 2 cans of Vienna sausages Directions Cook the macaroni in plenty of salt water, until soft. Remove from heat, drain them and pour warm water again. Drain again. Make a white sauce with the recipe we offer you lower, and add the grated cheese. Cut into wheels several sausages, leaving 6 whole for adornment. Combine the macaroni, sauce, and sausage slices.

item.title: macaroni with sobreasada
item.description: Ingredients 1 pound of macaroni 8 cups of water 2 tablespoons salt 1-4 pound of broken ham 1-2 cup oil 2 split onions 1 clove of crushed garlic 1-4 pound of oversized des menuzada 1 can of tomato paste 1 cup water Directions Boil the macaroni in salted water and drain them after cooking. Fry the ham in the oil and add the other ingredients Simmer for 15 minutes. Add the macaroni and stir.

item.title: marengo chicken
item.description: Ingredients 1 tender chicken (about 1-1-2 kilos), broken into 4 pieces 1-2 cup olive oil 3 tablespoons cognac 1 medium onion, chopped 2 tablespoons flour 1 cup dry white wine 1 cube of chicken bouillón 1-4 cup mashed tomatoes 3 sprigs of parsley 1 pinch of dried thyme 1 bay leaf, small 200 grams of fresh mushrooms slices 1 cup toasted croutons Directions Chicken pieces, including giblets, are sprinkled with salt and pepper.

item.title: peasant stew
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup chickpeas 1 cup peas 3 red chorizos 1 teaspoon oregano 2 bay leaflets 1 sprig of parsley 1 onion 1 pepper oil salt Directions Chickpeas and peas are left to soak from the day before, after washing them well. They are brought to a boil in the same water in which they have dawned. When they take point, the bay leaf, oregano, parsley are added, the onion and peppers are chopped and sautéed in oil with a pinch of salt and this is added along with the chorizos in pieces.

item.title: potato cake
item.description: Ingredients 2 pounds of potatoes 1 teaspoon salt 2 beaten eggs 4 tablespoons flour 2 cups minced meat filling Directions Boil and mash the potatoes. Add salt, eggs, and flour. Divide into two portions. Put a part in a greased mold so that it shakes the entire mold. Pour the picadillo and spread it and rub with the rest of the potatoes. Cook in a moderate oven at 350 degrees F for 30 or 40 minutes.

item.title: potato cream soup
item.description: Ingredients 6 tablespoons butter 2 teaspoons salt 1-4 teaspoon pepper 3 tablespoons tri flour go 6 cups of hot milk 1 tablespoon grated onion 2 cups mashed potatoes Directions Prepare the bechamel by melting the butter. Add salt, pepper and flour and stir until it forms a pass. Pour the hot milk and onion and move constantly. When it boils add the mashed potatoes. Serve hot.

item.title: pumpkin purée
item.description: Ingredients 6 cups broth 1-2 pound split pumpkin in pieces 2 tablespoons flour 1 tablespoon mantequi at Directions Boil the pumpkin in the broth. Strain and mash the pumpkin, mix the flour with a little cold broth, add the butter and put on the fire, stirring constantly and add the rest of the broth. Season to taste and serve warm.

item.title: rice with sausages
item.description: Ingredients sofrito 5 split sausages 1 1-2 pounds of rice 1 teaspoon salt 3 tablespoons butter with annotto 3 cups water Directions Add the sausages, rice and butter with sofrito and cook for two minutes. Add the water and season to taste. Cook until the rice is a little dry, lower the heat, stir two or three times and keep covered until serving.

item.title: roast chicken
item.description: Ingredients 1 3 lbs. chicken cut into pieces wheat flour, salt and pepper frying fat 1-1-2 cups sifted flour 1 1-2 teaspoon powder baking 1 teaspoon salt 4 eggs 1 1-2 cup milk 3 tablespoons butter or fortified margarine, melted black pepper Directions Put the chicken pieces in a cartridge, with flour, salt and pepper, and shake the cartridge so that the pieces are well covered with flour. In a large skillet, endow the chicken on both sides, in hot fat.

item.title: Salvadorean rice and chicken
item.description: Ingredients 2 cups rice coarse salt 5 cups of hot water 1 bay leaf 1 lemon husk lemon juice 6 poultry livers lard 1-2 onion in fine julienne 1 glass of marsala wine 1 pinch of salt 1 pinch of black pepper 1 pinch of cinnamon 2 teaspoons rice starch 1 cup warm milk Directions Put in a clay pot the rice with the salt, water, bay leaf, a piece of lemon peel and a little lemon juice.

item.title: seafood salad
item.description: Ingredients 1 can of salmon 3 cooked potatoes 2 hard-boiled eggs 6 green and 6 black olives thin slices of onion lettuce leaves 1-2 cup oil 1 teaspoon salt the juice of a lemon 1 tomato Directions in a dish, lettuce leaves, on top of thinly sliced potatoes, onion, salmon season with salt, oil and lemon and garnish with tomato, hard-boiled egg slices and olives.

item.title: serenade
item.description: Ingredients 1 pound of cod 1 sliced onion olives to taste 2 sliced tomatoes French sauce Directions Put the cod in water for a few hours to remove some of the salt Boil, remove the skin and thorns and cut into small pieces. Place the cod in a bowl and garnish with tomato wheels, onions and olives. Pour the French sauce. Serve with other boiled foods: banana, sweet potato, potatoes, etc.

item.title: simple spaghetti sauce
item.description: Ingredients 1 chopped onion 1/4 cup of oil 4 garlic cloves 1 cup of tomato sauce 1 can of tomatoes 1 bay leaf 1 teaspoon of sugar 1 teaspoon of salt 1/2 teaspoon of ground pepper Directions Fry the onion in the oil. Add the other ingredients and simmer until it thickens, approximately half an hour. Mash and strain.

item.title: stuffed chicken
item.description: Ingredients 1 4-pound chicken 3 teaspoons salt 3 cloves of crushed garlic half a teaspoon of oregano powder 1 chopped onion 1-1-2 pounds of pork a quarter pound of ham 3 tablespoons butter 2 tablespoons tomato sauce 1 tablespoon raisins Directions Marinate the chicken inside and outside several hours before filling it. Grind the ham and the pork and add the other ingredients seasoning and re llane the chicken. Thing the opening and grease it on the outside with butter.

item.title: stuffed sausage
item.description: Ingredients 3-4 pounds of ground beef 3-4 pounds of ground pork 2 teaspoons salt 1-2 teaspoon nutmeg 1-4 teaspoon pepper powder 1 egg 2 egg yolks 1-4 cup cognac cracker meal 1-4 pound precooked ham cut into thin slices Directions Place the meats in a bowl and add the salt, nutmeg and pepper. Stir until the ingredients are well mixed. The egg is added and when it is well bound, a yolk is added and after well-bound the second one is added.

item.title: tomatoes a la mireille
item.description: Ingredients 6 tomatoes 1 onion 3 eggplants 1 garlic 1 cup white wine 3 egg yolks parsley 1 cup grated cheese cookie powder salt Directions Tomatoes are divided into two and are emptied, seasoned with salt and pepper. They are fried with the onion cut into small pieces the eggplant in thin slices. They are sprinkled with white wine. Add the salt to taste, parsley and grated cheese. Let it cool and add the three egg yolks Tomatoes are stuffed and sprinkled with cookie powder They are placed in a mold, sprinkled with grated Parmesan cheese and au gratin in the oven for 5 minutes.

item.title: Venetian sausages
item.description: Ingredients A pound of fine sausage aciete water salt three-quarters of a pound of cut and peeled potatoes butter milk one egg for each sausage redondel Directions
